players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am innocent and saw Charlie with the detective last night.Vote for Diana."
Bob: "Charlie was acting suspiciously last night. I think he might have been the one to kill Diana."
Diana: "Bob, I don't think Charlie would have been the one to kill me. If he was acting suspiciously, it's likely because he was investigating Alice. I still believe Alice is the mafioso."
